items.name: Luck Totem
items.effect: Summons a Luck Totem for 5 minutes, increasing your Luck by 50% .

items.name: Warrior Totem
items.effect: Summons a Warrior Totem that strongly boosts your damage for about 5 minutes.

items.name: Vitality Totem
items.effect: Summons a Vitality Totem that steadily regenerates your health for around 5 minutes.

items.name: XP Totem
items.effect: Summons an XP Totem for 5 minutes that increases XP gain by 100% earned while it is active.

items.name: Miner Totem
items.effect: Summons a Miner Totem for 5 minutes, granting 20% faster mining and 15% extra mining damage .
